channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.description: The pivotal U.S. jobs report for December is supposed to be the first normal one since the government shutdown, but it could prove devilishly hard for...

item.title: A shift in leadership is taking shape in the U.S. stock market. Here’s where investors can find fresh opportunities.
item.description: The S&P 500 has barely budged since late October. Yet beneath the surface of the U.S. equity market, big shifts have been taking place.

item.title: This 100-year-old stock-market indicator just flashed a buy signal. Here’s how investors should read it.
item.description: A stock-market indicator that has been used by investment analysts for more than a century flashed a bullish signal this week.

item.title: Lockheed and Northrop shares dive as Trump says he’ll ‘not permit’ dividends and buybacks in defense sector
item.description: President targets executive pay as he calls for faster production and maintenance of military equipment

item.title: Why is Intel’s stock surging? Here’s what Wall Street has to say.
item.description: As the AI trade broadens out, Intel’s stock was leading the S&P 500’s gainers.

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.

item.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
item.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.
